channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Apple Suffers 2 Defeats in One Day Amid Patent War with Masimo
item.description: The Apple-Masimo saga is long and has many plot twists.

item.title: LTO tape storage is still going strong despite Elon Musk's efforts to wipe it out - and there's now even 40TB cartridges for the AI age
item.description: LTO’s 40TB Ultrium tape revives magnetic storage with Aramid film and a roadmap targeting 913TB for AI-scale data.

item.title: JPMorgan doesn’t want to pay Frank founder Charlie Javice’s legal bills
item.description: A lawyer representing JPMorgan said Javice’s legal team billed for expenses including luxury hotel upgrades, 24 hours of work in a single day, and cellulite butter.
